mapper.insert: insert into abc_recharge_record (recharge_id, recharge_user_id, recharge_account_id, recharge_seq_no, recharge_amount, recharge_state,recharge_date,recharge_out_seq_no ) values (#{rechargeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rechargeState,jdbcType=INTEGER},now(),#{rechargeOutSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into abc_recharge_record
recharge_id,
recharge_user_id,
recharge_account_id,
recharge_seq_no,
recharge_amount,
recharge_state,
recharge_out_seq_no,
recharge_date

mapper.update:
update abc_recharge_record
recharge_user_id = #{rechargeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recharge_account_id = #{rechargeAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_seq_no = #{rechargeSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
recharge_state = #{rechargeState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recharge_out_seq_no = #{rechargeOutSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where recharge_seq_no = #{rechargeSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update abc_recharge_record set recharge_user_id = #{rechargeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_account_id = #{rechargeAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recharge_seq_no = #{rechargeSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_state = #{rechargeState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_out_seq_no = #{rechargeOutSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where recharge_id = #{rechargeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(distinct a.user_id) FROM abc_user a INNER JOIN abc_account_info b ON a.user_id = b.account_user_id INNER JOIN abc_recharge_record c ON b.account_mark = c.recharge_account_id
1=1
and a.user_real_name like concat('%', #{tocashRecordJDO.custName}, '%')
and c.recharge_state = #{tocashRecordJDO.extcashState,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and c.recharge_date between
#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
'1970-01-01'
and
#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
now()
and b.account_user_type in ('1','2')

SELECT count(distinct a.emp_id) FROM abc_employee a INNER JOIN abc_account_info b ON a.emp_id = b.account_user_id INNER JOIN abc_recharge_record c ON b.account_no = c.recharge_account_id
1=1
and a.emp_real_name like concat('%', #{tocashRecordJDO.custName}, '%')
and c.recharge_state = #{tocashRecordJDO.extcashState,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and c.recharge_date between
#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
'1970-01-01'
and
#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
now()
and b.account_user_type = '3'
